sections.heading: and schooling certificate; Department of Labor to prescribe form
sections.text: The age and schooling certificate provided for herein shall be made out upon blank forms prescribed and furnished in triplicate by the Department of Labor.SourceLaws 1907, c. 66, § 9, p. 263;R.S.1913, § 3583;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV,

48-309.Age and schooling certificate; Department of Labor to prescribe form.

The age and schooling certificate provided for herein shall be made out upon blank forms prescribed and furnished in triplicate by the Department of Labor.

SourceLaws 1907, c. 66, § 9, p. 263;R.S.1913, § 3583;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV, art. III, § 9, p. 554;C.S.1922, § 7677;C.S.1929, § 48-309;R.S.1943, § 48-309;Laws 1945, c. 116, § 1, p. 389.
